text: The list of shipwrecks in June 1830 includes all ships sunk, foundered, grounded, or otherwise lost during June 1830. ==3 June== ==4 June== ==5 June== ==8 June== ==11 June== ==22 June== ==25 June== ==28 June== ==29 June== ==Unknown date== ==References== 1830-06
title: List of shipwrecks in June 1830
